description: Free the feet without sacrificing a secure, shoe-like fit. The Webber™ pairs the adjustable webbing of Astral’s award-winning life jackets with the Balanced Geometry™ and super sticky G Rubber™ grip of our world renowned Loyak™ water shoes. Featuring our most breathable, open top sandal design, the Webber is built to run, jump, swim and climb.
name: Astral Webber - Mens

specs.value: 75C closed cell EVA foam, 13 mm thick
Flex Grip™ outsole with G.ss Rubber™
True to size (for half size, size up)
